descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content:
Atlas HoverPoint - Make Your Point With Interactive Imagery

Atlas HoverPoint is a powerful yet easy-to-use Atlas tool for creating interactive images in Microsoft 365. HoverPoint makes learning and sharing knowledge so much simpler and more effective.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content:
Driven organisations are always looking at how to improve employee engagement and spread knowledge. Our work with hundreds of companies has led us to a clear, concise answer: focus on learning.

For too long an organisation’s knowledge, if it’s captured at all, is wrapped up in long, tough-to-digest documents heavy on text and light on engagement. We all know a picture paints a thousand words, so why don’t we apply that?

With Atlas HoverPoint anyone can create eye-catching and interactive images with clickable regions to super charge engagement and add life to your digital workspace.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
• Data sprawl
    Knowledge sharing becomes more difficult as new data silos proliferate and create end-user confusion.
  • I can’t find stuff
    Employees can spend 1.8 hours per day searching for and gathering information (McKinsey).
  • The QR code on the gate of a construction site entrance provides all the necessary Health and Safety information about the site.
  • A QR code on a piece of equipment links to a visual guide detailing the maintenance activities to be performed, keeping expensive machinery in top working order and minimising down time.
  • Using Atlas Search to find the error code from a machine display, workers can then access a graphic with all the information needed to resolve the problem.
  • QR codes at strategic points provide maintenance or cleaning staff with interactive floor plans. 
  • Employees unfamiliar with the audio-visual technology in the room can scan the QR code and get immediate visual guides for setting up.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
• A simple user interface to create and edit, click and point, add your text and save.
  • Hover with a mouse, click or tap to display rich text guides and links to further content (with video coming soon). 
  • Use icons to add visual cues to content (e.g; power, entry/exit points, hazards etc.)
  • Embed within Atlas knowledge pages or MS Teams tabs.
  • Optimised for mobile and other devices.
  • Store as many images with as many HoverPoints as you need.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content:
• Engaged users = more productive users
    Atlas simplifies daily tasks, taking the stress out of work life and making tech more accessible.
  • Knowledge should flow seamlessly through every organisation
    Atlas makes it easy for everyone to contribute, be heard and find the knowledge they’re looking for
  • Easy and improved collaboration
    Atlas makes collaborating easy, with simple provisioning tools that provide agility and enriched, visually engaging areas to produce and consume content. People can collaborate, share stories and just enjoy.
  • Measure success
    Atlas has advanced workspace provisioning, designed for the end-user but controlled by IT and governed by the business.Powerful analytics enable the organisation to measure success.
